title: Altair: Handle having no sync committee look ahead prior to fork activation
body:
### Description
When requesting sync committee duties for the first epoch that Altair activates, the exception below is encountered.  I suspect the head state is still pre-fork (because of #3943) but is considered suitable because it is within the previous sync committee period.  It should be considered unsuitable because it's from prior to the fork and we need to apply the epoch transition to migrate it to an Altair state.
